alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, central Magoffin and northeastern Wolfe Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Adele, or 11 miles south of West Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lewis, Burg, Wheel Rim and Caney around 425 PM EDT. Epson, Hager, Netty, Lykins, Cutuno, Harper, Dale, Holliday and Williams around 430 PM EDT. Stella, Kernie, Ova, Bethanna, Patton, Fritz, Seiltz, Puncheon, Wonnie and Eugene around 435 PM EDT. Gullett, Gifford, Elsie, Hendricks and Cisco around 440 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Salyersville, Mason, Lakesville, Stringtown, Burning Fork, Licksburg, Perlie, Cyrus, Mashfork and Bradley. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 53 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern and northeastern Kentucky.
